elements: Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with any information you can assemble on the secret histories of the world. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He's looking for a Substantial treatise on the secret histories of the world. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He's looking for particularly obscure information on the secret histories of the world. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with any information you can assemble on the severe mysteries of the Lantern. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with a Substantial discussion of the severe mysteries of the Lantern. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with an Very Substantial investigation of the severe mysteries of the Lantern. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She'd like something inspired by the principle of the Forge. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She'd like something more Substantial on the Forge. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She'd like something Very Substantial, or indeed intense, on the change and the suffering the Forge brings. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She would like something titillating about the Red Grail. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She's interested in a more Substantial response to the Red Grail and its allure. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She wants something Very Substantial and 'unflinching' on the Red Grail. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. In particular, she wants something suitably intriguing about the principle called Moth. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She wants a Substantially enigmatic piece on Moth. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She'd like an Very Substantial elaboration of Moth and its enigmas. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

The Count will pay for information of interest. This time, he'd like some notes on the corporal mysteries of the Heart. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]

The Count will pay for information of interest. This time, he'd like Substantial research on the corporal mysteries of the Heart. [Use Work with appropriate Lore to complete this commission; Talk to the patron again to get paid for it.]
